CustomField.formula: IF( (LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' + IF(LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c = 0, '100', TEXT(ROUND(LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c / LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c * 100, 2))) + '% (' + TEXT(LimitsAggregateQueriesUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsAggregateQueriesMax__c) + ')'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ✅ when 80% or less of the limit is used, ⚠️ when 80.1-89.9% is used, or ⛔ when 90% or more is used
CustomField.label: Aggregate Queries
